She graced local and international stages, stirring millions with her beguiling voice and spectacular performance. Yet behind the larger-than-life persona and her memorable songs was a woman about whom we know little. She didn’t like to be interviewed and never volunteered details about herself and her family. Hers was the life of a Hollywood legend and she paid the price for it. This is a story about fame and loneliness, acclaim and loss, daring and compromise. For the first time, the woman behind the crown, the cloak and the palace will come to light.","popularity":5.562,"poster_path":"/fFOyYie187Tm3QGPQ8RdQgKcv8M.jpg","release_date":"2021-07-03","title":"המלכה שושנה","video":false,"vote_average":9.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/wOLBB1sTlGJOmmyzlsEjBCgaI5T.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":551364,"original_language":"es","original_title":"Bajo la Corteza (26 canciones de Leño)","overview":"","popularity":3.502,"poster_path":"/7usFiMJwiyneUXxEZi8OTGXT4PE.jpg","release_date":"2010-02-23","title":"Bajo la Corteza (26 canciones de Leño)","video":true,"vote_average":10.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":396226,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Marillion Unconventional","overview":"Three thousand fans from fifty two countries. Three shows. One band. The story of the 2015 Marillion Weekend at Port Zélande, The Netherlands and a snapshot of a band 17 Albums and 35 years into an extraordinary career.\r Featuring in-depth interviews and stunning live footage, ‘Unconventional’ takes you behind the scenes of one of the music industry’s most unique events. Filmed at Port Zélande and during the run up to the weekend itself, ‘Unconventional’ explores the band’s rehearsal process, the production of Marillion’s impressive show media and what’s involved in putting together such an unusual and complex event. This is not just a backstage view, it’s also an exploration of how Marillion has endured and prospered in an increasingly challenging industry, how the band feel about their music, their reinvention of the music business, their lives, and of the unique relationship that marillion has with its fans.","popularity":1.151,"poster_path":"/w5mowtVtXyPUXU6G2dGgUjunts4.jpg","release_date":"2015-12-01","title":"Marillion Unconventional","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/z7CHuA1oxeN1Q298EesJ0A151zJ.jpg","genre_ids":[99],"id":547170,"original_language":"de","original_title":"Criminal Minded 2","overview":"","popularity":1.253,"poster_path":"/n3ivXXqoZB0LC2oJEDungWDnSj.jpg","release_date":"2009-11-28","title":"Criminal Minded 2","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":399193,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Last Whites of the East End","overview":"Documentary exploring the effect of mass immigration on the dwindling white community of the East End, from the perspective of those who remain and those who chose to leave.","popularity":1.268,"poster_path":null,"release_date":"2016-05-24","title":"Last Whites of the East End","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":1},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/f4vUM967HcMbeEb3iwFnWQ0Xpwc.jpg","genre_ids":[99,10402],"id":1033814,"original_language":"fr","original_title":"La Rockeuse du Désert","overview":"The Desert Rocker is an intimate, witty and profound portrait of the extraordinary Hasna El Becharia, a pioneer Gnawa artist. USIA films, The Wall distills political events into an emotionally clear and compelling ideological \"story\". In 1962 Walter de Hoog gathered footage from U.S. and German newsreel sources and crafted this taut short film about the first year of the Berlin Wall. Straightforward, keenly balanced narration portrays Berliners as \"accepting the wall but never resigned to it\". The concert includes a number of tracks from Holidays In Eden, alongside favorites from previous albums such as “Berlin,” “Incommunicado,” and much more.  The Blu-ray deluxe edition features a brand-new 2022 stereo remix in 96/24 Stereo LPCM, DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1 and 96/24 5.1 LPCM. As well as B-Sides \u0026 bonus tracks, such as “The Moles Club” demos recorded after the band’s long writing process for the album. From early planning, through to the day of the show, and including unparalleled behind the scenes footage, follow Louis on the journey to The Away From Home Festival.
